title: Queensland’s First Vineyard Glamping Experience
description: Indulge in a Sanctuary by Sirromet glamping experience at Queensland’s renowned 500-acre Mount Cotton winery (just a 30-minute drive from Brisbane). Escape the everyday with a stay in an elegant tented pavilion set amid the paperbark trees and bushland of a sprawling vineyard that offers breathtaking views across Moreton Bay. Includes daily breakfast, AU$100 food and beverage credit to spend across three on-site restaurants, a premium wine tasting and behind-the-scenes tour for two, a bottle of limited-edition, award-winning wine and one day of unlimited play Supa golf.
offer_address: 850 Mount Cotton Rd, Mount Cotton QLD 4165

title: QLD’s First Vineyard Glamping Experience
description: The press can’t stop talking about the newly opened Sanctuary by Sirromet glamping experience at Queensland’s renowned 500-acre Mount Cotton winery (just a 30-minute drive from Brisbane). Be one of the first to stay in an elegant tented pavilion set amid the paperbark trees and bushland of a sprawling vineyard that offers breathtaking views across Moreton Bay. Includes a daily breakfast hamper of local produce, guided winery tour and daily cellar door wine tastings of six wines.
offer_address: 850 Mount Cotton Rd, Mount Cotton QLD 4165

title: Laidback Vineyard Glamping Retreat near Brisbane with Daily Breakfast & Cellar Door Wine Tasting
description:
Indulge your senses and inner wine connoisseur with a glamping stay at the serene Sanctuary by Sirromet. A tranquil bushland haven of 18 superbly appointed tented pavilions, this unique addition to the family-owned Sirromet Winery is ideally located for leaving the hustle and bustle behind you as you reconnect with nature - while only being 30 minutes from Brisbane CBD.

Wandering kangaroos, gleeful kookaburras, alfresco dining and glamping amid 560 acres of native bushland are the attractions that make up this glamping sanctuary. Set around a natural lagoon fringed with gum trees and a nearby winery, this boutique property invites you to roam through nature with a glass of top-notch vino in hand. Spend your days here exploring the lush grounds and nearby vineyards, dining on Italian-inspired fare at Tuscan Terrace and sampling award-winning Granite Belt wines from the cellar door, before returning to your private sanctuary, affording lake views from the floating balcony.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a breakfast hamper (Mon-Fri) or be treated to a cooked breakfast at the Tuscan Terrace come the weekend (Sat-Sun)
- Cheers to relaxation with a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival
- Enjoy a one-time premium wine tasting and cheese platter experience from the onsite Cellar Door
- Take home a bottle of Signature Collection Cabernet Sauvignon upon checkout
- Come and go as you please with complimentary parking for one vehicle throughout your stay

**Travelling as a group?** Upgrade to a spacious Family Pavilion, offering elegant comfort and style, with twin single beds and a queen bed to ensure everyone is accommodated - valid for up to four guests aged 11 years and older.

**Extended stay bonus**: Escape the city buzz for that bit longer and swap your welcome wine for A$50 dining credit per pavilion for stays of 3+ nights, or indulge with a 5+ night stay and truly savour the culinary delights onsite with A$150 dining credit per pavilion.
offer_address: 850 Mount Cotton Road, Mount Cotton, Queensland 4165, Australia

title: Tranquil Vineyard Glamping Retreat near Brisbane with Cellar Door
description:
Indulge your senses and reconnect with nature during a stay amid the tranquility of the Australian bush at Sanctuary by Sirromet on Mount Cotton, where you’ll find luxurious tented suites and pavilions located on the grounds of Sirromet Winery. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, Sanctuary by Sirromet offers high-class amenities, award-winning wines and a peaceful setting.

Spend balmy evenings on your private deck overlooking the sparkling laguna, with the serene silence only interrupted by the rustling of the trees, scampering local fauna and the clink of wine glasses as you toast to your escape. The best part? You’re perfectly positioned on a luscious vineyard for a tipple of award-winning Granite Belt wine. When you're not savouring the fruits of the land, the two onsite restaurants will take your tastebuds on a culinary journey.
offer_address: 850 Mount Cotton Road, Mount Cotton, Queensland 4165, Australia
